Hero.description: I code like autumn leaves falling. Building web applications and designing user experiences.

About.title: About Me
About.subTitle: Get to Know Me
About.description:
I'm a Full-Stack Developer passionate about building scalable, user-centric applications. My expertise spans frontend development with React, Zustand, and TypeScript, as well as backend systems with Node.js, MongoDB, and Spring Boot.
 At my current role, I design and implement end-to-end features — from intuitive UI components to robust API services. I’ve also contributed to AI-powered modules by integrating OpenAI embeddings and Pinecone, enabling smarter search and knowledge management solutions.
 I enjoy working with clean architecture principles (SOLID, CQRS, Onion Architecture) and continuously seek to write maintainable, high-quality code. Beyond technical skills, I value collaboration and effective problem-solving within agile teams.
 Currently, I’m expanding my expertise in AI integrations and scalable backend systems while staying curious about emerging technologies.

Database.title: Full Backup Management
Database.description: Backup or restore the entire database and all images in MinIO as a ZIP.
Database.warning: Importing will delete existing data. The process may take time based on file size.
Database.confirm: THIS ACTION WILL DELETE ALL CURRENT DATA (DATABASE AND IMAGES) AND RESTORE FROM BACKUP! Do you want to continue?
Database.pleaseWait: This may take a few minutes.
Database.importWarning: Selected sections will be DELETED from the current database and replaced with backup data. This action cannot be undone!
